portfolio.title: Fugger
portfolio.info: A helpfull tool to align your company income and budget planing. Provides a upload function for excel shett from your tax advisor.

portfolio.title: Web-Table
portfolio.info: My personal project due to my passion for pen & paper. It should provides an easy and clean way to play with your friends all over the world, regardless of the choosen rule set.

portfolio.title: Custom Gin
portfolio.info: My first team project in Wild Code School bootcamp. Its a little game to show what kind of Gin you are.
